attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with recent news on our president but UI was horrible. I hope that his team works to make this app better, also give Mount Rushmore back to those who rightfully own it (spoiler alert: not u).

attributes.review: Opened app to see a big picture of Dongald Trump. Very orange, very disturbing. 0/10 do not recommend if you have a sensitive stomach. One look and I could barely keep my dinner down. Very unappealing design. Would give 0 stars if I could.
attributes.title: Is this supposed to happen?
